speaker: Customer
text: Yes, this is John. Who is this?

speaker: Agent
text: Hi John, this is Sarah from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: I'm doing alright, thanks. What’s this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I’m calling to discuss your outstanding balance with Acme Corp. Can you confirm your address for me?

speaker: Customer
text: I live at 123 Elm Street. What’s the amount?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you! You currently have a balance of $450. How would you like to proceed with this payment?

speaker: Customer
text: Can I pay it in installments?

speaker: Agent
text: Yes, we can arrange that! We can set up a payment plan for you. What amount would you like to pay each month?

speaker: Agent
text: That works! I'll set that up for you. Do you want to use your bank account for the payments?

speaker: Customer
text: Yes, that’s fine. When will the first payment be deducted?

speaker: Agent
text: The first payment will be deducted next month on the 15th. Is there anything else I can help you with today?

speaker: Customer
text: No, that's all. Thank you for the help!

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome! Have a great day!
